text:
Last Tuesday I filed for unemployment and I entered my bank info for direct deposit. I said I would get a test deposit in five days but I haven't received it.

And today I sign in to claim my weekly benefits, and it is asking if my deposits were 'verified'. Im not sure i fi should re-enter the bank info or not?

Anybody else gone through this?

[see here](https://i.imgur.com/JTLhzei.png)
title: Unemployment direct deposit
